entry.name: rules
entry.desc: Return the validations rules for the first selected element.

longdesc.p:
There are several ways to specify validation rules.
Validation methods without parameters can be specified as classes on the element (recommended)
Validation methods with parameters can be specified as attributes (recommended)
Both can be specified as metadata using the metadata plugin
Both can be specified using the rules-option of the validate()-method

argument.name: "add"
argument.desc: A string indicating to add a set of rules.

argument.name: rules
argument.desc: The rules to add. Accepts the same format as the rules-option of the validate-method

argument.name: "remove"
argument.desc: A string indicating to remove rules.

argument.name: rules
argument.desc: The space-separated names of rules to remove and return. If left unspecified, removes and returns all rules. Manipulates only rules specified by the rules option of the .validate() or .rules("add") method.
